WorkItem.Description:
I'd like to ask the author of this fine project to take a few minutes and incorporate answers to the dozens of valid issues that have been posted here, and in comments to the project building instructions.

As a couple of examples, pointing out that JQuery library version may need to be changed from original downloaded project, and example connection strings to SQL Server database ( vs CE. )

These questions have been answered (many times) in the comments, but a quick edit within the article would save frustration to the readers of this otherwise well written article.

Comments.Message: Yes, it's obvious a huge amount of work went into this project. It seems like a few hours of fixing minor issues (e.g., changing the jquery references to 1.5.1, updating the project to v4, etc) would keep this great example relevant.
